Sentencas: A solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) integrated with single effect desalination (SED) unit is modeled and optimized from exergoeconomic, enviroeconomic and exergoenvironmental points of view.
Titulo: Optimum performance of a single effect desalination unit integrated with a SOFC system by multi-objective thermo-economic optimization based on genetic algorithm

Sentencas: A multi-criterion optimization technique based on genetic algorithm in the form of three various scenarios is accomplished.
Titulo: Optimum performance of a single effect desalination unit integrated with a SOFC system by multi-objective thermo-economic optimization based on genetic algorithm

Sentencas: In scenario I (exergoeconomic optimization), the total exergy efficiency (eta(e,t)) and total cost rate ((Z)over dot(t)) of the hybrid system are assumed as two objective function, while in scenario II (enviroeconomic optimization), the CO2 emission rate (EMI) and total cost rate ((Z)over dot(t)) of the hybrid system are considered as the two objectives.
Titulo: Optimum performance of a single effect desalination unit integrated with a SOFC system by multi-objective thermo-economic optimization based on genetic algorithm

Sentencas: Eventually, in scenario III (exergoenvironmental optimization), the total exergy efficiency (eta(e,t)) and the CO2 emission rate (EMI) are presumed as the optimization functions.
Titulo: Optimum performance of a single effect desalination unit integrated with a SOFC system by multi-objective thermo-economic optimization based on genetic algorithm

Sentencas: In various scenarios, optimization technique is carried out with the aim of maximizing the eta(e,t) and minimizing the EMI and(Z)over dot(t).
Titulo: Optimum performance of a single effect desalination unit integrated with a SOFC system by multi-objective thermo-economic optimization based on genetic algorithm

Sentencas: The multi-objective optimization results show that among different scenarios, the minimum total cost rate and CO2 emission rate occurs in the Scenario II, while the maximum total exergy efficiency occur in the Scenario I.
Titulo: Optimum performance of a single effect desalination unit integrated with a SOFC system by multi-objective thermo-economic optimization based on genetic algorithm

Sentencas: In addition, it is revealed that, at the optimal conditions, the maximum net electrical power is achieved by Scenario I. (C) 2019
Titulo: Optimum performance of a single effect desalination unit integrated with a SOFC system by multi-objective thermo-economic optimization based on genetic algorithm
